rgh-console(script)# set color always
NO_COLOR is set; pass --color=always to force ANSI
rgh-console(script)# help console
Network appliance-style console shell for chaining rustgenhash commands

Usage: console [OPTIONS]

Options:
      --script <FILE>
          Run console commands from a script file (non-interactive mode)

      --ignore-errors
          Continue executing script commands after failures

      --color <WHEN>
          Color console-owned output: auto (default), always, or never
          
          [default: auto]
          [possible values: auto, always, never]

      --history-file <FILE>
          Persist console history to FILE (defaults to platform config path when retention is enabled)

      --history-retention <MODE>
          History retention policy (sanitized is default for interactive sessions, off for scripts)
          
          [possible values: off, sanitized, verbatim]

      --force-script-history
          Allow scripts to write history even though it is disabled by default (requires explicit retention)

  -h, --help
          Print help

  -V, --version
          Print version

Examples:\n  rgh console\n  rgh console --script playbook.rgh\n  rgh console --script playbook.rgh --ignore-errors
